page.title: 10RELIGION IN WOODLAND-SOCIAL
page.content: There are 2{wardens}Mr C Simpson and MR W Dalkin and there is a warden Emeritus which means he has given long service to the church he is called Mr G Simpson.The{secratary}is Mrs P Richardson. { Activities}for{adults}are-: Womens Meeting Point,Mothers Union,Handbell Ringers,Weddings,Choir Singing,Flower Festival and. { Activities}for{children}are -:Loaves and Fishes Club,Christmas play, Christmass party,Confirmation Classes and Handbell Ringers. There are a few other{activities}for {adults}and{children}they are -:Harvest Supper,Confirmations,Parish Weekends,Garden Party,Funerals,Baptisims and Sale of Work.
